word_group.brief_definition: 口语英语；英语口语；英语口语能力
已有人认领的；已有人拥有所有权的；已被预订的；被保留（给别人）的；爱情关系已确定的

word_group.phrase: many a true word is spoken in jest

bilingual.source: She has a talent for spoken poetry.
bilingual.target: 她在口语的诗歌方面很有天赋。

bilingual.source: The course focuses on improving spoken English skills.
bilingual.target: 这门课程注重提高口语的英语技能。

bilingual.source: He prefers spoken communication over written communication.
bilingual.target: 他更喜欢口语的交流而不是书面交流。

bilingual.source: Spoken words can sometimes convey emotions better than written words.
bilingual.target: 口语的表达有时比书面表达更能传达情感。

bilingual.source: The teacher emphasized the importance of spoken language in daily interactions.
bilingual.target: 老师强调了在日常交流中口语的重要性。

bilingual.source: The students often ask Mr Li for some advice on improving spoken English.
bilingual.target: 学生们经常向李先生寻求一些提高英语口语的建议。
同问有关于英语口语的问题
记住，听力永远是口语的前提。

bilingual.source: What is the best way to learn spoken English?
bilingual.target: 学习英语口语的最佳方法是什么?。

bilingual.source: So, how to balance accuracy and fluency in spoken English?
bilingual.target: 所以，英语口语的准确与流利，如何才能平衡起来呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Whatever happened to "don't speak until spoken to"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不说话，没人当你是哑巴？

yingyinNormal.en: Who's Cathy spoken to? Foreign Minister hasn't returned her call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凯茜给谁打电话呢？外交部长仍未回电话。

yingyinNormal.en: Has he spoken yet, is he driving, does he have a favorite liqueur?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说话了吗？会开车了吗？他有偏好的甜酒吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, yes. And she understands that condition? You've spoken with her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的。她明白这个条件吧，你跟她谈过了。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Have you spoken to him? A few minutes ago. He said he did what he thought was right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，你跟他谈过了吗？是的，几分钟前。他说他做了他认为该做的事。

yingyinNormal.en: I wouldn't have spoken up if it weren't for a little girl and a baby boy being put at risk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果不是因为牵涉到两个孩子的安危，我也不会多这个嘴。

yingyinNormal.en: Young men, have you spoken up in a conversation when a woman was casually degraded or dismissed?
yingyinNormal.zh: 小伙子们，在一位女性被随意贬低或忽视的谈话之中，你们有没有挺身而出？
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《艾玛·沃特森达沃斯世界经济论坛HeForShe演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: It was the last thing I said to you, remember? The day they took me away. No. No? We've spoken since then.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是我对你说的最后一件事，记得吗？就是他们带走我的那天。不。不吗？那之后我们也说过话。

yingyinNormal.en: You are my friend, Sam. You always will be. But your leaders have spoken. From here, the fight will be your own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是我的朋友，山姆，永远都是，但你们首领已经说了，从今以后你们只能独自战斗。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you mean? Well, I mean, Sheldon never talks about him. They haven't spoken in years. He wasn't at the wedding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么意思？谢尔顿从来没提过他。他们多年不曾联络。他也没来参加婚礼。

yingyinNormal.en: And have you spoken with him? His office isn't returning our calls. Neither is Mendoza's, but... I should've stuck to my guns.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你跟他谈过了吗？他办公室不回我电话。Mendoza也是。我不该让步的。

yingyinNormal.en: I've spoken to the PM. He's agreed to keep you in office for now. I'm issuing pardons for five On-the-Runs, one is your cousin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经向首相汇报，他同意现在先让你继续工作。我正在给5个逃犯签发特赦令，其中一个是你的表哥。

yingyinNormal.en: I've already spoken to her father. But at this point in the investigation, we are very confident that Ms. Kim's life was taken on her way out of town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经通知过她的父亲。调查到这里，我们可以确信的是金女士已经遇难在她出城的路上。

yingyinNormal.en: Languages actually spoken by living people do not exist in neatly divided categories, but tend to transition gradually, crossing borders and classifications.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正在被人类使用的语言不存在严格的种类划分，而是逐渐过渡，跨越界限和分类。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 说话者；议长；演讲者；做讲座者；讲某种语言的人
adj. 以某种方式说话的
n. 说话；讲话；谈话；演讲

word_family.mean: v. 说话；讲话；责备；劝告；表明；显示；发出特有的响声；发言；交谈；谈话

examination_example.sentence: What do most people think is very important in <highlight>spoken</highlight> communication?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人认为在口语交际中什么是非常重要的？

examination_example.sentence: So a common language is required and in postcrossing that's English since it's widely <highlight>spoken</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以在后交叉中需要一种通用语言，那就是英语，因为它被广泛使用。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>spoken</highlight> languages were enough in all my interactions (交往).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我所有的互动中，口语已经足够了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 口语英语；英语口语；英语口语能力

examination_example.sentence: Knowledge passed on in this method is called the <highlight>spoken</highlight> tradition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种方法所传递的知识被称为口语传统。

examination_example.sentence: The students often ask Mr Li for some advice on improving <highlight>spoken</highlight> English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们经常向李先生寻求一些提高英语口语的建议。

examination_example.sentence: Theatrical art forms in many other countries do not present singing, dancing and <highlight>spoken</highlight> parts in one single drama.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多其他国家的戏剧艺术形式并没有在一部戏剧中呈现唱歌、跳舞和口语部分。
